name: The Caretaker (Tim)
description:
Created for an Extra Credit's Game Jam #6 with the theme "Take Care". Guide your player around a home looking for the creature your grandfather has left in your care when he passed.

This point-and-click adventure game was created with the Adventure Creator asset from the Unity Asset Store.

Final puzzle solution has bug that doesn't trigger game over, but if you open the chest in the office then you've beat the game.
